title: Commission Regulation (EEC) No 1971/85 of 17 July 1985 amending Regulation No 225/67/EEC on detailed rules for determining the world market price for oil seeds
header:
COMMISSION  REGULATION (EEC) No 1971/85
of 17 July 1985
amending Regulation No 225/67/EEC on detailed rules for determining the world market price for oil seeds
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN
COMMUNITIES
main_body:
Regulation (EEC) No 225/67/EEC is hereby amended as follows:
1. In Article 5, '4,6 ECU' in (a), '5,5 ECU' in (b) and '5,3 ECU' in (c) are replaced by '4,8 ECU' '5,7 ECU' and '5,5 ECU' respectively.
2. In the first indent of Article 8 (1), '4,6 ECU' and '5,5 ECU' are replaced by '4,8 ECU' and '5,7 ECU' respectively.
3. In the third indent of Article 8, '3,6 ECU' is replaced by '3,7 ECU'.
4. The table in the Annex is replaced by the following table:
'(ECU/100 kg)
1.2,3 //   //   //   // Coefficient of equivalence  // 1.2.3 //   // Amount te be deducted from the price  // Amount to be added to the price  //   //   //   // A. Colza and rape seed from:  //   //   // - Canada  // 1,268  // -  // - Other non-member countries  // 1,075  // -  // B. Sunflower seed from:  //   //   // - United States or Canada  // -  // 0,854 2919/67. (6) OJ No L 277, 20. 10. 1984, p. 7.

This Regulation shall enter into force on the day of its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 17 July 1985.
For the Commission
Frans ANDRIESSEN
Vice-President  // - Other third countries  // -  // 0,592'  //   //   //
